data.title: Tommy Savas
data.meta_description: Tommy Savas is an American actor. On House, M.D., he portrayed Masters' med school classmate Cruz in the Season 7 episode Last Temptation. Savas has had featured roles in The Sopranos, General Hospital, Psycho Girlfriend, Extra Butter Please, The Online Gamer, The Last Ship, and State of...
data.text:
Tommy Savas is an American actor. On House, M.D., he portrayed Masters' med school classmate Cruz in the Season 7 episode Last Temptation.

Savas has had featured roles in The Sopranos, General Hospital, Psycho Girlfriend, Extra Butter Please, The Online Gamer, The Last Ship, and State of Affairs.

Connections[]

Appeared with Salli Richardson-Whitfield and Anna Khaja on Stitchers

Appeared with Chris McKenna and Nestor Carbonell on State of Affairs

Appeared with Nick Lane in The Online Gamer

Appeared with Meat Loaf in The Moment

Appeared with Currie Graham on Raising the Bar

Appeared with Clifton Powell on Shark

Appeared with Ron Perkins on Without a Trace

Appeared with Thom Barry on Cold Case

Appeared with Sherilyn Fenn on Law & Order SVU
